SELECT v.id as vlogId, v.vlogger_id as vloggerId, u.face as vloggerFace, u.nickname as vloggerName, v.title as content, v.url as url, v.cover as cover, v.width as width, v.height as height, v.like_counts as likeCounts, v.comment_counts as commentsCounts, v.is_private as isPrivate FROM vlogs v LEFT JOIN users u ON v.vlogger_id = u.id WHERE v.is_private = 0
AND v.title like '%${paramMap.search}%'
ORDER BY v.create_time DESC
